summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey Epstein, detailing transportation charges for services rendered. The invoice includes specific charges, payment due dates, and references to other parties involved in the shipping process.

keyFacts: The invoice is dated December 22, 2000, and is addressed to Jeffrey Epstein.
Total charges on the invoice amount to $143.07.
The package was picked up on December 18, 2000, and delivered on December 19, 2000.
Ghislaine Maxwell is mentioned as a recipient of a package sent to Little St. James.
The invoice includes various transportation charges and a fuel surcharge.
